column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " I just ca n't stand by and do nothing ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " Aang , no !
#Text=" Toph says : " How are we doing ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Things could n't get much worse .
#Text=The universe just loves proving me wrong , does n't it ?
#Text=" Toph says : " You make it too easy !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Thank you , the universe !
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey , Aang !
#Text=We 're going into town to find some dinner .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , I am pretty hungry .
#Text=Maybe dinner 's a good idea .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Here , tie this around your head .
#Text=It will cover your arrow .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm not going out if I ca n't wear my arrow proudly !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , come on .
#Text=Be practical .
#Text=" Katara says : " You guys go ahead without us .
#Text=We 'll catch up to you .
#Text=I think I understand why being a secret bothers you so much .
#Text=You do n't want people to think you failed .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're right , I do n't .
#Text=But the problem is , I did fail !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , that 's not true .
#Text=" Aang says : " It is true .
#Text=I was in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=I was there !
#Text=But I lost .
#Text=And now the Earth Kingdom is fallen for good .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's not for good .
#Text=Remember , there 's still a plan .
#Text=The invasion !
#Text=" Aang says : " And I hate the invasion plan , too !
#Text=I do n't want you or anyone else risking your lives to fix my mistakes !
#Text=I 've always known that I would have to face the Fire Lord .
#Text=But now I know I need to do it alone .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang ... " Aang says : " Katara , please !
#Text=Just go ... please .
#Text=" Katara says : " Is there anything you need ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I need to redeem myself .
#Text=I need my honor back .
#Text=" Katara says : " I brought you some food !
#Text=Oh no ... "
